name: Expedition Cosmos Pinball
description:
Expedition
Cosmos
Pinball

Thousands of asteroids threaten to destroy the Earth forever. A lost base in the Cosmos is the last chance to stop and destroy them.

Unfortunately, there is only one soldier left standing after the last batch of asteroids and it is the only chance that the Earth has to survive. Don't let the asteroids go through the base. If you get the victory score, you will have saved the Earth from its complete annihilation.

Welcome to "Expedition Cosmos" a video game that seeks to emulate the old Pinball with the spirit of new technologies. This prototype version is based on a single level but the goal is to develop multiple levels so the player always has new challenges.

In-Game controls (Pinball bats): Keyboard = Left Alt + Right Alt or mouse = Left click + Right click

In the game, there is a feedback link to a poll. Please leave your comments and help us to keep improving the game.

Thanks for playing Expedition Cosmos Pinball V1.0!

The development team.
